mapper.select: SELECT sr.id id, sr.create_time createTime, sr.`name` `name`, sr.url url, sr.description description, sr.category_id categoryId FROM t_sys_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN t_sys_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_resource sr ON sr.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND sr.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY sr.id
